title: Soccer Game
body: The length of time, in hours, it takes an "over 40" group of people to play one soccer match is normally distributed with a mean of two hours and a standard deviation of $$0.5$$ hours. A sample of size $$n$$ $$=$$ $$50$$ is drawn randomly from the population.
lesson: 7.1 The Central Limit Theorem for Sample Means (Averages)
